'''Varesa''' is a playable {{Electro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

An orchard manager hailing from the [[Collective of Plenty]], Varesa has a generally easy-going lifestyle. In battle, she is a warrior of great strength and speed, dubbed as the "Masked Hero" by the children within her tribe. She is known to enjoy competitive eating, finishing tremendous amounts of food with the help of her unusually large appetite.
